publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-387 Brian Adam: Medical Use of Cannabinoids—That the Parliament welcomes the recently announced clinical trials into the pharmacological efficacy of cannabinoids in pain relief for medical use. Supported by: Kay Ullrich*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Bruce Crawford*, Irene McGugan*

S1M-387 Brian Adam: Medical Use of Cannabinoids—That the Parliament welcomes the recently announced clinical trials into the pharmacological efficacy of cannabinoids in pain relief for medical use. Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Bruce Crawford, Irene McGugan, Cathy Jamieson*, Fiona McLeod*
